quickTempFile.command.create.title: Quick Temp File: Create or Open File...
quickTempFile.command.createNoDialog.tit: Quick Temp File: Create Instant File
quickTempFile.config.defaultExtension.de: Default file extension (including the leading dot) to be appended if no extension is provided. Default is `.txt`.
quickTempFile.config.defaultPath.descrip: Default directory for temporary files. If empty, the system's temporary directory is used (e.g., `/tmp` or `%TEMP%`). Default is empty.
quickTempFile.config.title: Quick Temp File
quickTempFile.command.apiCreate.title: Quick Temp File: Create File
quickTempFile.config.cleanupStrategy.des: Defines when temporary files created during the session should be automatically deleted.
quickTempFile.config.cleanupStrategy.onE: Delete a temporary file as soon as its editor tab is closed.
quickTempFile.config.cleanupStrategy.onW: Delete all temporary files from the session when the VS Code window is closed.
